name: Yet Another Fantasy Battle Arena Game - pre-alpha demo release
name_original: Yet Another Fantasy Battle Arena Game - pre-alpha demo release
description:
A top-down action game with multiple teams and a few spells. This is a pre-alpha demo release, so expect some fairly rough edges, but with v. 0.2 the game should be much more user-friendly 😀. 

Instructions: Move with WASD/arrow keys, hold space to assign input buttons to actions, mouse buttons for using actions. P for (un)pausing. Kill all enemies and don't die in order to win.

Hints:

* Some levels are (fairly) difficult.
* Circle-strafing is often a good approach.
* The sole kind of unit spawner can own at most ten units at a time.
* Fireballs have friendly fire.
